description:
S.Genomics is an ecosystem that brings together several projects in the field of genomics and big computing. One of the important components of the project is a digital DNA storage or electronic Biobank.

The name of the CTAGtoken token is an abbreviation of 4 types of nitrogenous bases that form DNA chains (Cytosine, Thymine, Adenine, Guanine). S.Genomics created CTAGtoken as a unit of a calculation inside an ecosystem.

You can use CTAGtoken for purchase DNA tests and get your health passport; get a cell to store your genomic data in a Biobank; use to pay for the lease of the computing power of neural network for research purposes.
name: CTAGtoken
